remarks: The difference of a real number modulo a positive real number and another real number equals the difference of the two real numbers modulo the positive real number.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 17-May-2018.)
statement: modsubmod $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( ( ( A mod M ) - B ) mod M ) = ( ( A - B ) mod M ) ) $.
